title: GreenScope – Urban Air Quality Dashboard
goal: Build a live dashboard that tracks AQI trends, visualizes pollutant composition, and predicts next-day air quality.
why_it_matters: Air pollution data exists but isn’t visualized in a way that helps people act on it.
data: OpenAQ API, local weather data, satellite air quality indexes.
ai: Time-series forecasting (Prophet / LSTM) for next-day AQI prediction.
workflow: Collect hourly AQI and weather feeds.
Display map + chart dashboards with safe-hour highlights.
outcome: Demonstrates ML forecasting + civic visualization; highly relevant sustainability app.
